ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED( GT_Client_Group__c ), ISPICKVAL( DS_Team_Approval_Status__c , "DS Approved"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Markets Ecosystems"), NOT($Profile.Name = "System Administrator"), NOT($User.Partner_Login_User_Profile__c = "System Administrator"), NOT($User.Partner_Login_User_Profile__c = "PT1"), NOT($User.Partner_Login_User_Profile__c = "Markets Ecosystems") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "GT Client Group" field is editable only for MEC team
